attributes.action: dismiss Darling as Chancellor in view of his mistaken claim and house "flipping"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Darling is widely distrusted and his house flipping is a clear example of milking the system.The inadvertent mistake would not be accepted if offered by a taxpayer.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
